experience: You and Susan both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Curtis Gunn, and 107 others

Develop an innovative population health management model that meets the payer market needs while providing great patient outcomes.  Build a strong team of professionals to coordinate the care among the various network providers. Integrate a series of technologies to create a seamless platform of data collection and communication throughout the continuum of care.  Lead the development of a proprietary predictive modeling solution to drive real-time decision making and clinical interventions based on real-time clinical and claims data feeds.

Innovative, leader in the post-acute care market space who developed an innovative transitional care model to manage patients transitioning from the hospital and skilled facilities to home. Successfully transitioned more than 1,800 patients across two markets reducing their readmission rates from greater than 23% to 5.2%.  Established unprecedented partnerships and relationships between the acute and post-acute market providers streamlining the care delivery process and facilitating improved patient outcomes across the continuum of care.  Developed a proprietary software solution to manage the transitional care process with real-time reporting and data access for all connected partners.

Led a leading edge predictive modeling company from start-up through exit, developing the market for predictive modeling in the marketing and education markets based on proven results in financial trading market.  Innovatively created integrated models into software solutions adapted to market workflows to optimize customer uptake and utilization.

June 30, 2015, Pilar reported directly to Susan

Susan Cordts is a forward thinking advocate of patient care. She has managed to combine compassion, knowledge, and the latest in evidence-based practice to ensure that every patient under her management receives th best care possible. As modern as she is with her vision she does not lose sight of the little things that many in healthcare do. She believes that everything starts with compassion. I had the privilege of working with her at Bridge to Care Solutions and would wholeheartedly recommend her and her company. You will not find anyone more dedicated than Susan.

summary: Catalytic Health PartnersCatalytic Health Partners is a population health management company with a third party administrator component.  This combination is powerful, as it allows Catalytic Health Partners to take advantage of the known contracted service source of a third party administrator while bringing the innovation and huge upside of population health management to its payer partners.  Catalytic Health Partners includes a suite of licensed and owned technologies to enhance the delivery of care, improving patient access to care while maximizing use of human capital.  These technologies have been integrated through interfaces as well as to export data to a master data set to support the analytics required for maximum opportunities identified through proprietary predictive models.Catalytic Health Partners realizes that technology and analytics are insufficient to provide the best results.  To this end, we provide a comprehensive post-acute network with a focus on improved patient outcomes as well as a full suite of case management and care coordination services.  Catalytic Health Partners ensures maximum performance and outcomes through the continuous monitoring and feedback from its technology and analytics.
name: Susan Cordts
title: President/CEO at Catalytic Health Partners
